entry.title: Ukraine Hits Hotel Hosting Russian Military
entry.content: Kyiv’s military demolished a hotel complex hosting dozens of Russian military personnel with U.S.-supplied long-range artillery, while more Russian drone strikes continued to destroy Ukraine’s electricity grid.

entry.title: China Props Up Belt-and-Road Borrowers Via Unusual Channel
entry.content: The People’s Bank of China has used currency-swap lines to support governments that borrowed heavily from Chinese banks.

entry.title: How U.S. Negotiators Secured Brittney Griner's Release
entry.content: Months of dragged-out talks led to a final frenetic few weeks that ended in freeing the two-time Olympic gold medalist.
